channel.title: eBPF - The latest news, updates and articles covering eBPF and related topics.
channel.description: eBPF is a revolutionary technology that can run sandboxed programs in the Linux kernel without changing kernel source code or loading a kernel module.

item.title: 【‍What Insights Can eBPF Provide into Real-Time SSL/TLS Encrypted Traffic and How?】‍eBPF 可以为实时 SSL/TLS 加密流量提供哪些见解以及如何提供？
item.description: 【Learn how eBPF user space probes (uprobes) can help bypass encryption limitations to monitor and interpret secure network traffic that traditional packet sniffers cannot】了解 eBPF 用户空间探测器 (uprobes) 如何帮助绕过加密限制来监控和解释传统数据包嗅探器无法实现的安全网络流量

item.title: 【‍eBPF- One Size Does Not Fit All】‍eBPF - 一种尺寸并不适合所有情况
item.description: 【Explore how eBPF is not a "one size fits all" solution despite how it is becoming widely adopted for various use cases】探索 eBPF 为什么不是“一刀切”的解决方案，尽管它已被广泛应用于各种用例

item.title: 【eBPF Challenge 1: XDP Return Codes】eBPF 挑战 1：XDP 返回代码
item.description: 【An eBPF challenge that showcases the consequence of returning a 0 value from an XDP program】一个 eBPF 挑战，展示从 XDP 程序返回 0 值的结果

item.title: 【‍Loops and Iterators in eBPF】eBPF 中的循环和迭代器
item.description: 【Learn how to use loops and iterators in eBPF and how to implement them effectively in eBPF applications】了解如何在 eBPF 中使用循环和迭代器以及如何在 eBPF 应用程序中有效地实现它们

item.title: 【CrowdStrike's Blue Screen blunder: Could eBPF have saved the day?】CrowdStrike 的蓝屏错误：eBPF 能否挽救局面？
item.description: 【Grafana Labs CTO, Tom Wilkie, discusses eBPF and its role in preventing incidents such as the CrowdStrike Windows kernel crash, while also addressing cloud economics and open-source development】Grafana Labs 首席技术官 Tom Wilkie 讨论了 eBPF 及其在防止 CrowdStrike Windows 内核崩溃等事件中的作用，同时还解决了云经济和开源开发问题

item.title: 【Reflecting on the eBPF Summit 2024: A Recap of Innovation and Community】反思 2024 年 eBPF 峰会：创新与社区回顾
item.description: 【A Recap of the recently concluded eBPF Summit 2024】最近结束的 2024 年 eBPF 峰会回顾

item.title: 【‍Introduction to eBPF】‍eBPF简介
item.description: 【Discover how eBPF allows developers to safely extend Linux kernel capabilities for observability, tracing, and security】了解 eBPF 如何允许开发人员安全地扩展 Linux 内核功能以实现可观察性、跟踪和安全性

item.title: 【First eBPF program】第一个 eBPF 程序
item.description: 【Learn how to write a Python program that compiles and loads the eBPF program into the kernel and attaches it to the execve system call】了解如何编写 Python 程序来编译 eBPF 程序并将其加载到内核中并将其附加到 execve 系统调用

item.title: 【‍Tetragon eBPF for Kubernetes: The Verdict Is Out】‍Kubernetes 的 Tetragon eBPF：结论已经出来
item.description: 【Dive into Tetragon's effectiveness in improving security and observability for cloud-native applications running on Kubernetes】深入了解 Tetragon 在提高 Kubernetes 上运行的云原生应用程序的安全性和可观察性方面的有效性

item.title: 【How Cloudflare auto-mitigated world record 3.8 Tbps DDoS attack】Cloudflare 如何自动缓解创纪录的 3.8 Tbps DDoS 攻击
item.description: 【Learn how Cloudflare were able to deal with a DDoS attack and protect their systems with XDP and eBPF】了解 Cloudflare 如何利用 XDP 和 eBPF 应对 DDoS 攻击并保护其系统
